pages.text: Arctinurus is a rather large Silurian Trilobite from Europe and North America. It reached lengths up to 30 cm and lived within semi-tropical waters. The pygidia is sectioned into leaf shaped portions which end in a spine. Many complete specimens of Arctinurus can be found in the Rochester Shale, New York, USA.
